product_name: Serfas True 1000 USB Front Bike Light with Thunderbolt Rear Light - 2014 Closeout
long_description: A super lightweight combo bike light, the Serfas True 1000 Front Light emits a bright 1,000 lumens and comes with a Thunderbolt Rear Light integrated in the battery pack.
short_description: A super lightweight combo bike light, the Serfas True 1000 Front Light emits a bright 1,000 lumens and comes with a Thunderbolt Rear Light integrated in the battery pack.
